From outbreaks to clinical trials, Epicentre's data science team (Epi-DS) leverages its expertise in epidemiology, statistical analysis, GIS, programming and data visualisation to drive actionable insight from public health data.

- Explore our collection of web-apps, tools, interactive dashboards and reports on our [gallery page](/gallery.html).
- For more information about our Outbreak Tools for data collection, check out the [project webiste](https://epicentre-msf.github.io/outbreak-tools/).
- Our open-source R packages can be found on [r-universe](https://epicentre-msf.r-universe.dev/packages).
